title: Shimano Dura-Ace AND Ultegra Deliver Fastest Shifting ever with wireless 12 speed groups
content:
For the first time in history, Shimano is launching their newest Dura-Ace group and the new Ultegra at the same time. That’s right, the new Shimano Dura-Ace R9200 and Ultegra R8100 12-speed groups are here, and they’re wireless, offer the fastest shifting ever, wider range gearing, massively improved braking, and a completely revised charging system.

The post Shimano Dura-Ace AND Ultegra Deliver Fastest Shifting ever with wireless 12 speed groups appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
